SourceString:
Hello!
This is an equipment coloring shop.
How can I help you?
<bw_break>
Thank you.\nWe Look forward to seeing you again.

I'm sorry but its not possible to dye
that piece of equipment. Please select
another piece ypu would like to dye.
<bw_break>
You don't have anything equipped there.\n<bw_break>
This piece of equipment isn't visibly equipped.\nDo you still want to dye it?\n<yesno><close>
Huh. It's the same...\nIt looks the same. Is that okay?\n<yesno><close>
Do you want to restore the original color?\n<yesno><close>
Huh? It doesn't seem to look any different.\nPlease choose a different color \n<bw_break>
Please choose an item to be dyed.\nWould you like to dye this?\n<yesno><close>
Please choose an item to be dyed.\nWould you like to dye this?\n<yesno><close>
That will be {金額} gold.\nIs that all right?\n<yesno><close>

Oh, you changed your mind.
Is there anything else I can do for you?
Oh? It looks like you don't have enough gold.\n<bw_break>

{装備品種別名} cannot be registered again.
You can register it again by deleting
it and re-registering. Would you like to?
<yesno><close>

Are you sure you want to delete {登録中アイテム}
and re-register {新規登録アイテム} instead?
Are you sure?
<yesno><close>
Are you sure you want to stop dying\nyour {新規登録アイテム}?\n<yesno><close>
Got it.\nNow, let's start coloring it then.\n<bw_break>
...Ah!\nThe coloring turned out beautifully!\n<bw_break>
Do you want to dye any other pieces\nof equipment?\n<yesno><close>
This equipment is used as glamour.\nAre you sure you want to dye it?\n<yesno><close>
This equipment is used as glamour.\nAre you sure you want to dye it?\n<yesno><close>
It seems that you don't currently have\nany colored equipment.\n<bw_break>
Oh? It seems that you don't have\nany equipment.\n<bw_break>
Do you want to stop coloring the\nselected equipment?\n<yesno><close>
